title: What's the cheapest smart watch for an iPhone user? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are an Iphone user and you are looking for a smart watch, the Apple watch is the best choice but if you are short on cash and you couldn't afford much on these watches, here are lists of cheap wearable watches. The Apple watch and Iphone are great together because the Apple watch is the only watch that fully supports IOS. However, there are other watches that can work with the iPhone such as the android wearable device but these aren’t compatible with iphone and won't fully work with it. These are much cheaper than the Apple watch. In any case if you are looking for a cheap smart watch that can be compatible with an iPhone, here are lists of few: Garmin vivosmart  This is the cheapest wearable device that is compatible with the iPhone, in addition to the cheapness but also a fitness tracking device in a small package. This smart can provide you with iphone notification as well as music controls and is totally waterproof so you don't have to bother about taking it off when you need a bath. This watch is being sold for as low as $79 Motor 360  The motor 360 is practically the most affordable smart watch in the market, you can buy a brand new one at the rate of $99. The moto 360 has a sport circular display and runs on Android wear. This smart watch has its own built-in software that can easily track your step and monitor your heart rate. This smart watch is simply the best when it comes to considering price with design. Huawei watch  This watch has a round display and culturally doesn't look like a smart watch at first glance, this watch runs on Android wear and practically won't work well with the iPhone. Pebble time Apart from being a cheap smart watch, this smart watch has a screen that uses an E-ink display which makes the battery last longer so you don't need to charge every few days. This watch is so amazing and it goes for as less as $129 which is an awesome price. The Best Cheap Smart Watches
